titles.title: I Have A New Heart, That The Lord Has Given Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have a new heart, that the Lord has given me.
I have a new heart. I have been set free.
A heart that will serve the Lord,
As He says in His word.
I have a new heart that loves the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tengo un nuevo corazon,
Que el Señor me ha dado.
Tengo un nuevo corazon.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yo he sido limpiado.
Un corazon que servira al Señor.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
En su palabra el dijo,
Tengo un nuevo corazon, que ama al Señor.
